name: TerrariaCraft
summary: TerrariaCraft is a mod for Minecraft: Java Edition that adds content from Terraria, a 2D game by Re-Logic, by completely changing how newly created worlds look with custom terrain generation, bigger and deeper caves to explore, and many more new features and mechanics than just that! Explore a finite island to find resources and biomes, fight against mobs to survive, and progress through the mod!
